text: National Bolshevism or Nazbolism or Nazbol is an ideology that tries to combine communism and fascism,Nazism .The people who support the ideology are called National Bolsheviks. The founder of the ideology is believed to be founded by Ernst Niekisch. In later years people like Eduard Limonov would become prominent figures in the Russian National-Bolshevik movement. Category:Communism Category:Fascism
title: National Bolshevism
